COSIE
  • Welcome to the COSIE documentation!

Welcome to the COSIE documentation!¶

COSIE enables within- and CrOss-subject Spatial multimodal Integration, prediction, and Enhancement.

To get started with cosie, check out the installation guide and tutorials.
